member.name: F:DSCore.Web.WebRequest.defaultRequestTimeout
member.summary: The default timeout to wait for a request to return, expressed in miliseconds

member.name: F:DSCore.Web.WebRequest.defaultRequestAttempts
member.summary: The default number of times to retry a failed request

member.name: F:DSCore.Web.WebRequest.defaultSecurityProtocol
member.summary: The default security protocol to default to. The protocol is required for interaction with HTTPS endpoints, irrespective of using System.Net or RestSharp libraries.

member.summary: The encapsulated Restsharp web request

member.name: F:DSCore.Web.WebRequest.response
member.summary: The encapsulated response from the server

member.name: P:DSCore.Web.WebRequest.Respose
member.summary: The response the server returned on the last execution of the request.

member.name: P:DSCore.Web.WebRequest.URL
member.summary: The URL for the request

member.name: P:DSCore.Web.WebRequest.Time
member.summary: The time it took for the request to complete

member.name: F:DSCore.Web.WebRequest.ForceSecurityProtocol
member.summary: Set this property to true to force requests to go through a security protocol (TLS1.2). This is required when interacting with servers and APIs that require use of HTTPS as a protocol rather than HTTP.

member.summary: Build a simple GET web request to the specified URL
member.param: The URL to send the request to.
member.returns: The request object, ready for execution.

member.summary: Sets the URL of the request.

member.returns: The request with an updated URL.

member.summary: Adds a parameter to the web request

The value of the parameter to pass along.

member.summary: Executes a WebRequest and returns the response from the server.

member.name: M:DSCore.Web.WebRequest.Deserialize``1(DSCore.Web.WebResponse,``0)
member.summary: Deserialises a web response to the type of a supplied object. Accepts JSON and XML as valid response contents.
member.typeparam: The object type to deserialize to.
member.param: The response from the server that needs to be deserialised.
The object that will be used to determine what type to deserialise to.
member.returns: The response deserialised as same type as supplied object.
